mapper.select: select count(*) from approval where mem_no = #{memNo} and status like '%' || #{status} || '%'

select a.doc_no ,a.form_no ,doc_name ,category ,form_name ,doc_content ,doc_date ,a.status ,line ,SORT from approval a join appr_form f on(f.form_no = a.form_no) JOIN (SELECT DOC_NO, LISTAGG(mem_name ||' '|| rank,',') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY APPR_LEVEL) AS line FROM APPR_ACCEPT JOIN MEMBER USING(MEM_NO) GROUP BY DOC_NO ORDER BY DOC_NO) AL ON (A.DOC_NO = AL.DOC_NO) JOIN( SELECT * FROM( select DOC_NO, mem_name ||' '|| rank SORT ,RANK() OVER (PARTITION BY DOC_NO ORDER BY APPR_LEVEL ASC) AS RANK from appr_accept aa join member m using(mem_no) where aa.status='대기' order by APPR_level) WHERE RANK=1 ) CURRENT_LEVEL ON(A.DOC_NO = CURRENT_LEVEL.DOC_NO) where a.mem_no=#{memNo} order by doc_date desc
